Jekyll + HTML5 History + Ajax is actually really easy.

What is This Monstrosity?

Jekyll, despite being a static site generator, is very HTML5 History- and AJAX-friendly. The key lies in History.JS, built by Benjamin Arthur Lupton, and a small piece of Javascript.
